name: The life outside - Forgotten Places Series
name_original: The life outside - Forgotten Places Series
description:
The Life Outside is a Survival Horror RPG settled in ancient Spain, where the player is tasked with finding a missing person.

It's about childhood and companionship, as well as showing the horrors that a child can go through in a less than ideal world to live in.

Game Controls:

WASD / Arrows - Move the character
Enter / Z - Confirm
Esc / X - Return

This game is PG 14+ (may contain mature content, although it does not use profanity or nudity at any instance.)

----

This project was made for a Game Jam and can be completed in under 30 minutes of gameplay.
